Gastonia.Spencer Mountain, North Carolina:
Spencer Mountain is a town in Gaston County, North Carolina, United States. The population was 37 at the 2010 census.


== Geography ==
The town is located at 35°18′29″N 81°6′31″W (35.308017, -81.108656) at the base of Spencer Mountain, a 1,250-foot (380 m) summit to the south.
